I_have_taken3.message: I have just taken your money

of_your_money1.message: of your money, I hope you do not mind.

the_time_has_come1.message: Pilot, the time has come. May the best win!

the_time_has_come2.message: What a beautiful ship you have, Pilot. Nice guns, too. Do you know how to use them?

the_time_has_come3.message: Wow! Worthy opponent for an old pirate. I guess you know how to use your weapons.

you_have_been_challenged1.message: Knight, you have been challenged to fight!

you_have_been_challenged2.message: Commander, you are in my domain. Prepare to engage in combat.

you_have_been_challenged3.message: You shouldn't have come here, Commander! Now I must destroy you!
